issue.title: [Go][Integration] Enable custom_metadata integtration test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8033](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8033). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6556 adds an integration test including custom metadata but Go is skipped.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8033?focusedCommentId=17426329) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
implementation of the extension type added support for the metadata properly. so resolving this as Go is no longer skipped for the custom metadata tests
